name: 高級寫作（一）
restrict: ◎限本系(含雙主修)修習◎必須先修過【ENU0287  中級寫作（一）】、【ENU0288  中級寫作（二）】
goals: To help students rehearse skills in various modes of writing
Help students build a good sense of the difference between smart, sophisticated, quality writing and bland, hackneyed writing
Students are expected to integrate writing techniques with their knowledge of the topic/subject

methodologies.note: The instructor will spend 15 minutes (first 5 minutes and last 10 minutes of the class) explaining and summarizing the content.
There will be in-class discussion among students.
Students will give feedback for their classmates' presentations, and the presenters will revise their own essays accordingly.

grading.note: Weekly in-class discussion and 4 online reviews
